name: Cap of the Scarlet Savant
tooltip:
Cap of the Scarlet SavantLevel 60

In order to create the Cap of the Scarlet Savant, you will be required to bring the following items back to Malyfous Darkhammer: 1 Pristine Hide of the Beast; 5 Frayed Abomination Stitchings; 8 Arcane Crystals; 5 Enchanted Scarlet Thread.

You will also be required to pay 50 gold pieces for the crafting of the item.

Requirements:
- Pristine Hide of the Beast
- Frayed Abomination Stitching x 5
- Arcane Crystal x 8
- Enchanted Scarlet Thread x 5
- Money:50
